member.name: OCSP_BASIC_SIGNED_RESPONSE_INFO
member.summary: The OCSP_BASIC_SIGNED_RESPONSE_INFO structure contains a basic online certificate status protocol (OCSP) response with a signature.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_SIGNED_RESPONSE_INFO.ToBeSigned
member.summary: A BLOB that has been encoded by using Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) and that contains an encoded structure.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_SIGNED_RESPONSE_INFO.SignatureInfo
member.summary: A pointer to signature information for the ToBeSigned data.
